alert.note: Alert for Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 10:52PM CDT until April 28 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN STARR AND SOUTHEASTERN ZAPATA COUNTIES... At 1052 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Falcon, or 7 miles southeast of Lopeno, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lopeno, New Falcon, Falcon Dam, Morales-Sanchez, Salineno, Falcon Heights and Falcon State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
